secondaries.shortDescription: Score point depending if they had a crossfire marker OR by a unit set up from ambush OR if the target was exposed

subObjectives.description: one or more enemy units were destroyed this turn by units from your army while they had a crossfire marker.
one or more enemy units were destroyed this turn by units from your army that were set up from ambush or from underground this turn.
one or more enemy units were destroyed this turn as a result of a ranged attack made by a model from your army, and that enemy unit was Exposed when it was selected as the target of that attack

secondaries.shortDescription: End of turn, score point if you have more models than your opponents (overall and in specific locations)

subObjectives.description: You have more models on the battlefield than your opponent does.
You have more models within your opponent’s deployment zone than your opponent does.
You have more models within your deployment zone than your opponent does.
You have more models on the battlefield that are within no man’s land than your opponent does.
All four of the above bullet points apply.

secondaries.shortDescription: Place 2 critical location on the battlefield (more than 9'' from edge and each other). You can Savotage Critical Location (End of movement step up to end of turn) with a GENESTEALER CULT or BROOD BROTHER unit
